ns1:metaData.ns1:description: Translate a source concept in one namespace to an (inversely) associated target concept in another namespace. Automatically detects whether the source namespace is in a standard FURTHeR namespace or in a non-standard FURTHeR namespace. Returns the default machine view.
ns1:metaData.ns1:name: Translate concept - default view

ns1:metaData.ns1:description: Translate a source concept in one namespace to an (inversely) associated target concept in another namespace.
ns1:metaData.ns1:name: Translate concept

ns1:metaData.ns1:description: Return the list of all known services' meta data objects.
ns1:metaData.ns1:name: Service list
